name: Adaptations
description:
This game was a submission to Global Game Jam 2023

Adaptations is a game about playing as different types of seeds created by a magic tree, each adapted to a different type of environment and trying to find a place to spread their roots. Play through three unique stages as a seed that floats in water, a seed that can charge a powerful dash, and a seed that can float and fly.

Look out for the rabbit, he has a gun.
